ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Digest Number 179
ygData.msgSnippet: Excuse me, only hybrid class... I/E, paladins and rangers must be humans or elves.. A SK can be a large race, which is a advantage to this class... ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Excuse me, only hybrid class...
I/E, paladins and rangers must be humans or elves..
A SK can be a large race, which is a advantage to this class...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Chip Paul" <cpaul@...>
To: <shadowknight@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 18, 2000 12:51 PM
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Digest Number 179


> "Steven E. Phipps" wrote:
> >
> > Frankly, imo, a SK is the BEST tank in the game hands down, and this is
also
> > a best kept secret. The ability to snare with darkness, FD pull, and
tank
> > with the best of them make it a awesome class. Also nice to have
> > invisibility to undead and self invis to move around. Great hybrid. I
would
> > ask you to consider your choice of race again. Another awesome aspect is
we
> > are the only class that can choose the ogre race, which gives great
stats,
> > and the ability to Slam. You could still group with your "goodie"
friends,
> > how often do you really need to enter a good city?
> >
>
> How do you figure that we're the only class that can choose the ogre
> race?
>
> Xilith
>
